courses.title: Book Cabin
courses.description: Constructed full-stack hotel booking platform featuring 50+ luxury cabin listings with amenity details and availability calendars Leveraged TypeScript and Prisma ORM for type-safe database operations managing 200+ booking records with PostgreSQL backend

courses.title: Prep Ai
courses.description: Engineered AI-powered interview preparation platform utilizing Gemini API to generate questions across 20+ technical topics Configured MongoDB database storing .

courses.title: Store It
courses.description: Created cloud file storage platform enabling users to upload, organize, and manage 10GB+ of files with drag-and-drop functionality Integrated Appwrite backend providing secure authentication, file operations.

courses.title: Prepwise â€“ AI Mock Interview Platform
courses.description: Prepwise is an AI-powered mock interview platform built with Next.js, Firebase, and TailwindCSS. It offers real-time feedback, voice-based interview simulations using Vapi AI and Google Gemini, and a responsive dashboard for session management.

courses.title: Easy-Eats
courses.description: Easy-Eats is a food ordering app using React, CSS, and Redux Toolkit. It fetches restaurant data via Swiggy's API and allows users to browse, filter cuisines, and manage their cart for seamless ordering.

courses.title: Weather App
courses.description: Create your very own weather application with real-time data. Learn how to use APIs to fetch and display dynamic weather information.
